<script>
	window.minicart_v2 = (function() {
			var that = {};
			
			that.closeCart = function closeCartFunc(e) {
	        	e.stopPropagation();
				document.getElementsByClassName( "flyoutCart minicart-v2" )[0].classList.add('miniV2-hide');
				document.getElementsByClassName( "flyoutUnderlay" )[0].classList.add('miniV2-hide');
			};
			
			that.closeShippingInfo = function closeShippingInfoFunc(e) {
				document.getElementsByClassName('whenWillIGetIt')[0].style.display = "none";
				document.getElementById("SGbackground").parentNode.removeChild(document.getElementById("SGbackground"));
			}
			
			that.nextItem = function nextItemFunc(e) {
	        	e.stopPropagation();
				minicart_v2.cartItems = document.querySelectorAll("ul.cart-item-slider > li");
				for( var i = 0; i < minicart_v2.cartItems.length; i++ ) {minicart_v2.cartItems[i].classList.remove('mini-item-show');}
				minicart_v2.cartItemIndex = minicart_v2.cartItemIndex + 1;
				if (minicart_v2.cartItemIndex < 0 ) { minicart_v2.cartItemIndex = minicart_v2.cartItems.length-1; } 
		     	if (minicart_v2.cartItemIndex > minicart_v2.cartItems.length-1 ) { minicart_v2.cartItemIndex = 0; }
		     	minicart_v2.cartItems[minicart_v2.cartItemIndex].classList.add('mini-item-show');
			};
			
			that.prevItem = function prevItemFunc(e) {
	        	e.stopPropagation();
				minicart_v2.cartItems = document.querySelectorAll("ul.cart-item-slider > li");
				for( var i = 0; i < minicart_v2.cartItems.length; i++ ) {minicart_v2.cartItems[i].classList.remove('mini-item-show');}
				minicart_v2.cartItemIndex = minicart_v2.cartItemIndex - 1;
				if (minicart_v2.cartItemIndex < 0 ) { minicart_v2.cartItemIndex = minicart_v2.cartItems.length-1; } 
		     	if (minicart_v2.cartItemIndex > minicart_v2.cartItems.length-1 ) { minicart_v2.cartItemIndex = 0; }
		     	minicart_v2.cartItems[minicart_v2.cartItemIndex].classList.add('mini-item-show');
			};
			
			that.getIndex = function getIndexFunc() {
				return minicart_v2.cartItemIndex;
			};
			
			that.setIndex = function setIndexFunc( int ) {
				minicart_v2.cartItemIndex = Math.floor( int );
			};
			that.cartItemIndex = 0;
			that.cartItems = 0; 
			
			return that;
	})();
</script>

<script>
function removeRewardsCookies() {
	require(['dojo/cookie'], function(cookie){
	
		var rewardsId = cookie("rewardsId");
		var rewardsDetails = cookie("rewardsDetails");

		if (rewardsId != "" || rewardsId != null)
		{
			cookie("rewardsId","",{expires: -1, path: "/"});
		}
		if (rewardsDetails != "" || rewardsDetails != null)
		{
			cookie("rewardsDetails","",{expires: -1, path: "/"});
		}
	});
	
	window.location = removeParam("webUserId", window.location.href);
}
function removeParam(key, sourceURL) {
    var rtn = sourceURL.split("?")[0],
        param,
        params_arr = [],
        queryString = (sourceURL.indexOf("?") !== -1) ? sourceURL.split("?")[1] : "";
    if (queryString !== "") {
        params_arr = queryString.split("&");
        for (var i = params_arr.length - 1; i >= 0; i -= 1) {
            param = params_arr[i].split("=")[0];
            if (param === key) {
                params_arr.splice(i, 1);
            }
        }
        rtn = rtn + "?" + params_arr.join("&");
    }
    return rtn;
}
</script>

<div id="bvseo-reviewsSection">
    <div class="bvseo-review" itemprop="review" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" data-reviewid="199307519">
        <meta itemprop="itemReviewed" content="Swiss Army Tourist Knife" />
        <span itemprop="reviewRating" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating">
            Rated <span itemprop="ratingValue">4</span> out of
            <span itemprop="bestRating">5</span>
        </span> by
        <span itemprop="author">jms0027</span> from
        <span itemprop="name">Good, basic pocket knife</span>
        <span itemprop="description">Bought this a couple monhnback, and it does the trick and is mostly what I'd wanted in a pocket knife. I'd recommed to anyone looking for a basic pocketknufe.</span>
        <div class="bvseo-pubdate">Date published: 2017-10-29</div>
        <meta itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-10-29" />
    </div>
    <div class="bvseo-review" itemprop="review" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" data-reviewid="155129474">
        <meta itemprop="itemReviewed" content="Swiss Army Tourist Knife" />
        <span itemprop="reviewRating" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating">
            Rated <span itemprop="ratingValue">5</span> out of
            <span itemprop="bestRating">5</span>
        </span> by
        <span itemprop="author">Kelsey</span> from
        <span itemprop="name">Great little knife!</span>
        <span itemprop="description">Awesome little knife. Fits on my keychain and has everything I need!</span>
        <div class="bvseo-pubdate">Date published: 2016-07-10</div>
        <meta itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-07-10" />
    </div>
    <div class="bvseo-review" itemprop="review" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" data-reviewid="97722780">
        <meta itemprop="itemReviewed" content="Swiss Army Tourist Knife" />
        <span itemprop="reviewRating" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating">
            Rated <span itemprop="ratingValue">5</span> out of
            <span itemprop="bestRating">5</span>
        </span> by
        <span itemprop="author">Ron</span> from
        <span itemprop="name">Buy 2!</span>
        <span itemprop="description">After spending much time and money trying to find the perfect EDC multi-tool, I finly discovered it after moving to Michigan and discovering Moosejaw. I love the 84mm SAK format since I find the 91mm (Climber for example) too big for comfortae pocket carry. If you're like me and wear sunglasses almost everyday, the mini screwdriver that fits inside the corkscrew is the perfect size for tightening the little screws found on eyewear. The awl/punch has a nice edge so you can save the sharper edge on the two other main blades. Something that many may not realize is that the width of the can opener is smaller than it's 91mm counterparts; good when using the small flathead found in the tip when trying to get at recessed screws. Be careful the two blades are RAZOR sharp! I bought 3 I live this knife so much. Most used tool? Bottle opener for opening my Bell's Lager! ;)</span>
        <div class="bvseo-pubdate">Date published: 2014-11-20</div>
        <meta itemprop="datePublished" content="2014-11-20" />
    </div>
    <div class="bvseo-review" itemprop="review" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" data-reviewid="97722779">
        <meta itemprop="itemReviewed" content="Swiss Army Tourist Knife" />
        <span itemprop="reviewRating" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating">
            Rated <span itemprop="ratingValue">5</span> out of
            <span itemprop="bestRating">5</span>
        </span> by
        <span itemprop="author">Benjamin</span> from
        <span itemprop="name">Has what you need in knife.</span>
        <span itemprop="description">I have a Kershaw that I carry, but the Swiss Army Tourist can't be beat for its multi-functionallity.  I carry both now and find myself using the Swiss Army knife more and more.</span>
        <div class="bvseo-pubdate">Date published: 2011-07-12</div>
        <meta itemprop="datePublished" content="2011-07-12" />
    </div>
    <div class="bvseo-review" itemprop="review" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" data-reviewid="97722778">
        <meta itemprop="itemReviewed" content="Swiss Army Tourist Knife" />
        <span itemprop="reviewRating" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating">
            Rated <span itemprop="ratingValue">4</span> out of
            <span itemprop="bestRating">5</span>
        </span> by
        <span itemprop="author">Alex</span> from
        <span itemprop="name">Good knife</span>
        <span itemprop="description">This knife has everything you need, nothing you don't.</span>
        <div class="bvseo-pubdate">Date published: 2010-10-28</div>
        <meta itemprop="datePublished" content="2010-10-28" />
    </div>
    <div class="bvseo-review" itemprop="review" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" data-reviewid="97722777">
        <meta itemprop="itemReviewed" content="Swiss Army Tourist Knife" />
        <span itemprop="reviewRating" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating">
            Rated <span itemprop="ratingValue">4</span> out of

        <span itemprop="description">This is simply a great all around knife. Not too big, but very useful tools.</span>

	    <script async type="text/javascript" src="//cdn-eu-ec.yottaa.net/53c6d66786305e30e100018d/www.moosejaw.com/v~22.16f/autocomplist_10208.js?yocs=3n_&yoloc=eu"></script>
	
	<script type='text/javascript'>
	var termTemplate = "<span style='font-weight:bold'>%s</span>";
	
	function swap(items, firstIndex, secondIndex){
	    var temp = items[firstIndex];
	    items[firstIndex] = items[secondIndex];
	    items[secondIndex] = temp;
	}
	
	function partition(items, left, right) {
		var p		= Math.floor((right + left) / 2);
	    var pivot   = parseInt(items[p].substring((items[p].indexOf(":") + 1)));
	    var i       = left;
	    var j       = right;
	
	    while (i <= j) {
	        while (parseInt(items[i].substring((items[i].indexOf(":") + 1))) > pivot) {
	            i++;
	        }
	        while (parseInt(items[j].substring((items[j].indexOf(":") + 1))) < pivot) {
	            j--;
	        }
	        if (i <= j) {
	            swap(items, i, j);
	            i++;
	            j--;
	        }
	    }
	    return i;
	}
	
	function quickSort(items, l, r) {
		var n = items.length;
	 	var index;
	 	l = typeof l != "number" ? 0 : l;
	 	r = typeof r != "number" ? n - 1 : r;
	 
	 	if(n > 1) {
	 		index = partition(items, l, r);
	 		if(l < index - 1){
	 			quickSort(items, l, index - 1);
	 		}
	 		if(index < r){
	 			quickSort(items, index, r);
	 		}
	 	}
	 	
	 	return items;
	}
	
	
	jQuery(function() {

		jQuery(".ui-menu-item div:contains('BRANDS')").parent("li").addClass("title bottom brands brands-upper right-autos");

		// jQuery(".ui-menu-item div:contains('BRANDS')").removeAttr("href");
		jQuery(".ui-menu-item div:contains('HISTORY')").parent("li").addClass("title bottom brands history right-autos");

		jQuery(".ui-autocomplete li.popular").nextUntil("li.brands").addClass("popular");

		jQuery(".ui-autocomplete li.popular").last().nextUntil("ul").addClass("right-autos");
		jQuery(".ui-autocomplete li.history").first().nextUntil("ul").addClass("right-autos");
		jQuery(".ui-autocomplete li.brands").first().nextUntil("ul").addClass("right-autos");
		jQuery(".ui-autocomplete li.popular").wrapAll("<div class='left-auto' />");
		jQuery(".ui-autocomplete li.right-autos").wrapAll("<div class='right-auto' />");
		
	    if (jQuery('.right-auto').length < 1){
	        jQuery(".left-auto").after("<div class='right-auto hide-for-small'><li class='ui-menu-item title'><div class='title'>BRANDS</div></li><li class='ui-menu-item'><div><em>No Results</em></div></li><li class='ui-menu-item title' style='margin-top:15px!important;'><div class='title bottom'>HISTORY</div></li><li class='ui-menu-item'><div><em>No Results</em></div></li></div>");
	    }

	    }
	    
	    if(jQuery('.brands-upper').length < 1) {
	    	jQuery('li.history').addClass("noMarT");
	    }

		     me.html( me.text().replace(contains_regex, function (matched) {
		      return termTemplate.replace('%s', matched);
		     }).replace(starts_regex, function (matched) {
		      return termTemplate.replace('%s', matched);
		     }));
		    });

	 select: function (e, ui) {

	 source: function( request, response ) {

		 if (wWidth > 550) {
	
			  //======SUGGESTED KEYWORDS======//
			  // Search for matches where the first word in the term starts with the search string
			  var starts_with_matchesKeywords = jQuery.map( availableTagsKeywords, function(tag) {

			    var oldRank = parseInt(tag.substring((tag.indexOf(":") + 1)));
			    var rank = parseInt(tag.substring((tag.indexOf(":") + 1))) * 2;
			    tag = tag.substring(0,(tag.indexOf(":"))) + ":" + rank;
			    return tag;

			  var contains_matchesKeywords = jQuery.map( availableTagsKeywords, function(tag) {

			    return tag;
			   }    
			  });
			  var top_matchesKeywords = starts_with_matchesKeywords.concat(contains_matchesKeywords);
			  	top_matchesKeywords = quickSort(top_matchesKeywords);		 
			  var sliced_topKeywords = top_matchesKeywords.slice(0,11);
			  	for (var i = 0; i < sliced_topKeywords.length; i ++) {
				  sliced_topKeywords[i] = sliced_topKeywords[i].substring(0,sliced_topKeywords[i].indexOf(":"));

			    var oldRank = parseInt(tag.substring((tag.indexOf(":") + 1)));

			    tag = tag.substring(0,(tag.indexOf(":"))) + ":" + rank;

			   }

			  // Search for matches where a word other than the first word in the term starts with the search string
			  var contains_matchesBrands = jQuery.map( availableTagsBrands, function(tag) {

				  sliced_topBrands[i] = sliced_topBrands[i].substring(0,sliced_topBrands[i].indexOf(":"));
			 	}
			  	 
			  //======HISTORY======//
			  var cookieValue = getCookie("searchTermHistory");
			  if(cookieValue) {
			  var cookieValueSplit = cookieValue.split('|');
			  
			  var history = "[\"HISTORY\"";
			  for(var i=0; i<cookieValueSplit.length; i++){
			   var searchTerm = cookieValueSplit[i];
			   searchTerm = searchTerm.replace("'","\'")
			   if(history.indexOf("\""+searchTerm+"\"") == -1){
			    history = history + ",\"" + searchTerm + "\"";
			   } 
			  }
			  history = history + "]";
			  
			  history = JSON.parse(history);
			  var history_matches = jQuery.map( history, function(tag) {
				  if(tag.toUpperCase().indexOf(request.term.toUpperCase()) >= 0 || tag.toUpperCase() == "HISTORY"){
					return tag;  
				  }
			  });
			  var sliced_history = history_matches.slice(0,4);
			  }
			  
			  //=====PRODUCE AUTO-SUGGESTIONS=====//
			  var top_matches = "";
			  foundOne = false;
			  if(Object.keys(sliced_topKeywords).length > 1) { 
				   if(foundOne){
				    top_matches = top_matches.concat(sliced_topKeywords);
				   }
				   else{
				    foundOne = true;
				    top_matches = sliced_topKeywords;
				   }
				  }
	
			  if(Object.keys(sliced_topBrands).length > 1) { 
			   if(foundOne){
			    top_matches = top_matches.concat(sliced_topBrands);
			   }
			   else{
			    foundOne = true;
			    top_matches = sliced_topBrands;
			   }
			  }
			  if(cookieValue){
			  if(Object.keys(sliced_history).length > 1) { 
			   if(foundOne){
			    top_matches = top_matches.concat(sliced_history);
			   }
			   else{
			    foundOne = true;
			    top_matches = sliced_history;
			   }
			  } 
			 }
	
			  response(top_matches.slice(0,23));
			 
		 }
		 
		 else {
			 
			  //======SUGGESTED KEYWORDS======//
			  // Search for matches where the first word in the term starts with the search string
			  var starts_with_matchesKeywords = jQuery.map( availableTagsKeywords, function(tag) {
			   if ( tag.toUpperCase().indexOf(request.term.toUpperCase()) == 0 || tag.toUpperCase().indexOf("POPULAR SEARCHES:") != -1 ) {
			    var oldRank = parseInt(tag.substring((tag.indexOf(":") + 1)));
			    var rank = parseInt(tag.substring((tag.indexOf(":") + 1))) * 2;
			    tag = tag.substring(0,(tag.indexOf(":"))) + ":" + rank;

			  // Search for matches where a word other than the first word in the term starts with the search string
			  var contains_matchesBrands = jQuery.map( availableTagsBrands, function(tag) {
			   if ( tag.toUpperCase().indexOf(" " + request.term.toUpperCase()) > 0) {
			    
			    return tag;
			   }

	function getSilverPopParametersFromURL(name)
	{
	 	name = name.replace(/[\[]/,"\\\[").replace(/[\]]/,"\\\]");
	  	var regexS = "[\\?&]"+name+"=([^&#]*)";
		var regex = new RegExp( regexS );
	 	var results = regex.exec( window.location.href );
		
		if(results == null)
		{
	   		return "";
	 	}
		else
		{
		 return results[1];
		}
	}
	
	var mailingID    = getSilverPopParametersFromURL('spMailingID');
	var recipientID  = getSilverPopParametersFromURL('spUserID');
	var mailingJOBID = getSilverPopParametersFromURL('spJobID');
	var reportJOBID  = getSilverPopParametersFromURL('spReportId');
	var cookieExpiryInDays = 365;

	if((mailingID != '') && (recipientID != '') && (mailingJOBID != '') && (reportJOBID != ''))
	{
	   dojo.cookie('mailingID', mailingID, {expires: 365, path: "/"} );	
	   dojo.cookie('recipientID', recipientID, {expires: 365, path: "/"} );	
	   dojo.cookie('mailingJOBID', mailingJOBID, {expires: 365, path: "/"} );	
	   dojo.cookie('reportJOBID', reportJOBID, {expires: 365, path: "/"} );	
	}

	var r  = dojo.cookie('recipientID');
	var j  = dojo.cookie('mailingJOBID');
	var rj = dojo.cookie('reportJOBID');

	servletURL = servletName + '?' + "m=" + m + ampersand + "j=" + j + ampersand + "r=" + r + ampersand + "rj=" + rj + ampersand + "name=" + name + ampersand + "s=" + s;
	if((m != '' && m!= null) && (r != '' && r!= null) && (j != '' && j!=null) && (rj != '' && j!=null))
	{
